extendedInfo.description: Ever feel that your vocal chords are too tired from speaking to answer questions over and over again throughout the day? Ever wish you could have an adolescent kid replace your voice for a while, so you can be temporarily mute? That's what IMT is here for! Give it a try: you can let us do the talking for you, with common (and some not so common) phrases to use in everyday life! Swipe between pages and tap the phrases to use them.This version has several phrases varying from greetings to sarcasm to pickup lines, features a male voice, and is ad-supported.Crayon box is essentially a group of high school students banded together for the purpose of developing software. Support us by rating/download/leaving a comment!Have any suggestions for this app? Want to see any other phrases included that would help you be mute? Rate, leave a comment, or email us at crayonboxlabs@gmail.com or visit us at www.crayonboxlabs.webs.com

reviews.title: Interesting!
reviews.comment: Although there are many apps just like this, what sets \"I\'m mute today\" apart from the rest is its intuitive artwork and grandiose amount of ingenious choice of words and phrases available. If this is only the Lite version, I am intrigued as to what the full version may contain!
reviews.author: Alfred Ly

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Definately interesting! As one of the first apps of this company, I feel like they are heading in the right direction with this app
reviews.author: A. Smith
